data: Ek baar ek chalaak lomdi ne ek baag me jaake ek tota ko dekh liya. Lomdi ne socha ki yeh tota bahut swadisht hoga aur usey khane ka man karne laga. Lomdi ne tota ko patane ke liye ek chalaak yukti socha. Usne apne munh se ek madhur geet gana shuru kar diya. Tota gehri neend me tha, lekin jab usne lomdi ka geet suna to usey bhaavnaon se bhara hua mehsoos hua. Tota ne socha ki yeh lomdi kitna achha gaata hai! Lomdi ke geet se mohit hokar, tota ne apni jagah chhod di aur neeche utar aaya. Jaise hi tota neeche aaya, lomdi us par tute padha. Lekin tota ne apne praan bachane ke liye turant ek darakht par udan bhari aur lomdi ko chhode chhadi. Lomdi apni chaalaki mein asafal raha. Is kahani se humein yeh shiksha milti hai ki hamesha saavdhan rahna chahiye aur apne shatruon se hamesha savdhan rehna chahiye.
